name: CrispyChan
description:
PVE game prototype . Game contains two modes: Puzzle and endless waves mode. In puzzles mode you try to solve puzzles and avoid deathly obstacles. In waves you try to survive as long as possible against many different monsters by using your characters many abilities. Default controls:

Movement=W,A,S,D.

Interrupt ability=C

Ability default controls (Can be changed in game).

Abilitity1=Left mouseclick Ability2=Right mouseclick, Ability3=Space, Ability4=Q, Ability5=E, Ability6=R Ability7=F .
